title: Tales from the Scrum Bowl: Servant-Leadership in the Dual Role of Scrum Master and Developer
description: What's it like to be a developer on a team *and* to serve as its Scrum Master? In this talk, we'll discuss life on an agile scrum team and what it means to wear both of these hats. Does being a Scrum Master take away from the development role? Which role takes priority? Do the roles compliment each other? And what can we learn from each experience?
